history.proof: intros RD. unfold RDestruct, flip. intros m n H P TP. apply RD with (m := n) (n := m). apply H. apply TP.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
B: Type
R: rel A B
T: rel A B -> Prop

Goal:
RDestruct R T -> RDestruct (flip R) (fun P : rel B A => T (flip P))

Premises:
RDestruct = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (T : rel A B -> Prop) => forall (m : A) (n : B), R m n -> forall P : rel A B, T P -> P m n : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> (rel A B -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments RDestruct {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope _%function_scope
flip = fun (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B -> C) (x : B) (y : A) => f y x : forall A B C : Type, (A -> B -> C) -> B -> A -> C Arguments flip {A B C}%type_scope _%function_scope
rel = fun A1 A2 : Type => A1 -> A2 -> Prop : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments rel (_ _)%type_scope
rdestruct : forall (m : ?A) (n : ?B), ?R m n -> forall P : rel ?A ?B, ?T P -> P m n where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?R : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- rel ?A ?B] ?T : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- rel ?A ?B -> Prop] ?RDestruct : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- RDestruct ?R ?T]
flip_relim : forall (R0 : rel ?A ?B) (m : ?B) (n : ?A) (P Q : Prop), RElim R0 n m P Q -> RElim (flip R0) m n P Q where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type]
flip_rintro : forall (R0 : rel ?A ?B) (m : ?B) (n : ?A), RIntro (R0 n m) (flip R0) m n where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type]
rexists : ?P -> ?R ?m ?n where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Prop] ?R : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- rel ?A ?B] ?m : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- ?A] ?n : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- ?B] ?RExists : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- RExists ?P ?R ?m ?n]
forall_rel : (forall (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2), ?E v1 v2 -> rel (?FV1 v1) (?FV2 v2)) -> rel (forall v1 : ?V1, ?FV1 v1) (forall v2 : ?V2, ?FV2 v2) where ?V1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?E : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- ?V1 -> ?V2 -> Type] ?FV1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- ?V1 -> Type] ?FV2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- ?V2 -> Type]
arrow_relim : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2) (m : ?A1) (n : ?A2) (P Q : Prop), RElim RB (f m) (g n) P Q -> RElim (RA ++> RB) f g (RA m n /\ P) Q where ?A1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?A2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type]
arrow_rintro : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2), RIntro (forall (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y)) (RA ++> RB) f g where ?A1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?A2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type]
forall_relim : forall (R0 : forall (x : ?V1) (x0 : ?V2), ?E x x0 -> rel (?FV1 x) (?FV2 x0)) (f : forall x : ?V1, ?FV1 x) (g : forall x : ?V2, ?FV2 x) (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2) (e : ?E v1 v2) (P Q : Prop), RElim (R0 v1 v2 e) (f v1) (g v2) P Q -> RElim (forallr e @ v1 v2, R0 v1 v2 e) f g P Q where ?V1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?E : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- ?V1 -> ?V2 ->...-> Type]
rexists_rstep : forall (P : Prop) (R0 : rel ?A ?B) (m : ?A) (n : ?B), RExists P R0 m n -> NonDelayed (RAutoSubgoals P) -> RStep True (R0 m n) where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type]
forall_rintro : forall (FE : forall (x : ?V1) (y : ?V2), ?E x y -> rel (?F1 x) (?F2 y)) (f : forall x : ?V1, ?F1 x) (g : forall x : ?V2, ?F2 x), RIntro (forall (u : ?V1) (v : ?V2) (e : ?E u v), FE u v e (f u) (g v)) (forallr e @ v1 v2, FE v1 v2 e) f g where ?V1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?E : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- ?V1 -> ?V2 -> Type] ?F1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- ?V1 ->...-> Type]
relim_base : forall (R0 : rel ?A ?B) (m : ?A) (n : ?B), RElim R0 m n True (R0 m n) where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type]
unfold_monotonic_rstep : forall (R0 : rel ?A ?B) (m : ?A) (n : ?B), RStep (R0 m n) (Related m n R0) where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type]
subrel_impl_relim : forall (R1 R2 : rel ?A ?B) (x1 x2 : ?A) (y1 y2 : ?B) (P Q : Prop), RElim impl (R1 x1 y1) (R2 x2 y2) P Q -> RElim subrel R1 R2 (x1 = x2 /\ y1 = y2 /\ P) Q where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type]
eq_subrel : forall R0 : rel ?A ?A, Reflexive R0 -> Related eq R0 subrel where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type]
RExists = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) => P -> R m n : forall A B : Type, Prop -> rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop Arguments RExists {A B}%type_scope _%type_scope _%rel_scope
RIntro = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) => P -> R m n : forall A B : Type, Prop -> rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop Arguments RIntro {A B}%type_scope _%type_scope _%rel_scope
reflexivity_rstep : forall (R0 : rel ?A ?A) (x : ?A), Reflexive R0 -> RStep True (R0 x x) where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B T : rel A B -> Prop |- Type]
RElim = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (P Q : Prop) => R m n -> P -> Q : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop -> Prop -> Prop Arguments RElim {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope _ _ (_ _)%type_scope
Related = fun (A B : Type) (f : A) (g : B) (R : rel A B) => R f g : forall A B : Type, A -> B -> rel A B -> Prop Arguments Related {A B}%type_scope _ _ _%rel_scope
rintro = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (RIntro : RIntro P R m n) => RIntro : forall (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B), RIntro P R m n -> P -> R m n Arguments rintro {A B P}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope {m n RIntro}
rintro_rstep = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (H : RIntro P R m n) => H : forall (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B), RIntro P R m n -> RStep P (R m n) Arguments rintro_rstep {A B P}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope {m n}
relim = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (P Q : Prop) (RElim : RElim R m n P Q) => RElim : forall (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (P Q : Prop), RElim R m n P Q -> R m n -> P -> Q Arguments relim {A B}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope {m n} {P Q}%type_scope {RElim}
subrel = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) => forall (x : A) (y : B), R1 x y -> R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel (rel A B) (rel A B) Arguments subrel {A B}%type_scope (R1 R2)%rel_scope : rename
related = fun (A B : Type) (f : A) (g : B) (R : rel A B) (Related : Related f g R) => Related : forall (A B : Type) (f : A) (g : B) (R : rel A B), Related f g R -> R f g Arguments related {A B}%type_scope {f g} {R}%rel_scope {Related}
flip_subrel = fun (A B : Type) (x y : rel A B) (H : subrel x y) (x0 : B) (y0 : A) (H0 : flip x x0 y0) => (fun H1 : forall y1 : B, x y0 y1 -> y y0 y1 => (fun H2 : x y0 x0 -> y y0 x0 => (fun H3 : y y0 x0 => H3) (H2 H0)) (H1 x0)) (H y0) : forall A B : Type, Monotonic flip (subrel ++> subrel) Arguments flip_subrel {A B}%type_scope
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
subrel_preorder : forall A B : Type, PreOrder subrel
arrow_rel = fun (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (RB : rel B1 B2) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) => forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y) : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type, rel A1 A2 -> rel B1 B2 -> rel (A1 -> B1) (A2 -> B2) Arguments arrow_rel {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (RA RB)%rel_scope : rename
ssrfun.all_sig : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (P : forall x : I, T x -> Prop), (forall x : I, {y : T x | P x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x | forall x : I, P x (f x)}
ssrbool.sub_mem = fun (T : Type) (mp1 mp2 : ssrbool.mem_pred T) => forall x : T, is_true (ssrbool.in_mem x mp1) -> is_true (ssrbool.in_mem x mp2) : forall T : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T -> ssrbool.mem_pred T -> Prop Arguments ssrbool.sub_mem {T}%type_scope
Field_theory.AF_AR : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req
Field_theory.AFinv_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI
Field_theory.Fdiv_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q))
Field_theory.AFdiv_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q))
RStep = fun P Q : Prop => P -> Q : Prop -> Prop -> Prop Arguments RStep (_ _)%type_scope
Field_theory.rdiv6 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall a b : R, ~ req a rO -> ~ req b rO -> req (rinv (rdiv a b)) (rdiv b a)
ssrbool.pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments ssrbool.pred _%type_scope
arrow_subrel = fun (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (x y : rel A1 A2) (H : flip subrel x y) (x0 y0 : rel B1 B2) (H0 : subrel x0 y0) (x1 : A1 -> B1) (y1 : A2 -> B2) (H1 : (x ++> x0)%rel x1 y1) (x2 : A1) (y2 : A2) (H2 : y x2 y2) => (fun H3 : forall y3 : B2, x0 (x1 x2) y3 -> y0 (x1 x2) y3 => (fun _ : forall y3 : A2, x x2 y3 -> x0 (x1 x2) (y1 y3) => (fun _ : x0 (x1 x2) (y1 y2) -> y0 (x1 x2) (y1 y2) => H0 (x1 x2) (y1 y2) (H1 x2 y2...
Ring_theory.ARmul_1_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x
Ring_theory.ARmul_0_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul x rO) rO

```coq
intros RD.
unfold RDestruct, flip.
intros m n H P TP.
apply RD with (m := n) (n := m).
apply flip_rintro.
apply H.
apply TP.
```

original: intros RD. unfold RDestruct, flip. intros m n H P TP. apply RD with (m := n) (n := m). apply flip_rintro. apply H. apply TP.
